reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Enhancing access to protection and reproductive health services to conflict-affected people in Tripoli

description.narrative: Il Programma intende contribuire a migliorare l'accesso dei gruppi più vulnerabili colpiti dal conflitto di Tripoli ai servizi di salute sessuale e riproduttiva, e ai servizi di prevenzione e di risposta alla violenza di genere (Gender Based Violence - GBV).
The Programma aims at enhancing access to protection and reproductive health services to conflict-affected people in Tripoli

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
UNFPA - FONDO DELLE NAZIONI UNITE PER LE ATTIVITÀ DELLE POPOLAZIONI

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: Ending violence against women and girls

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

By 2030, ensure universal access to sexual and reproductive health-care services, including for family planning, information and education, and the integration of reproductive health into national strategies and programmes
Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
